Block.Name: GetPlayerChampion
Block.Description: Returns the champion associated with the client player.
Block.Label: {Out:Output}=CurrentPlayerChampion

Block.Name: GetPlayerBuffCount
Block.Description: Returns the number of instances of a given buff, regardless of caster, on the Player. Buffs that do not exist will return 0, but empty buff names will cause the node to return FAILURE. Note, INTERNAL buffs don't get sent down to the client, so this will not find them.
Block.Label: {Out:Output}=Count({BuffName})

Parameter.Name: BuffName
Parameter.Description: Name of the buff to look for.

OutParameter.Name: Output
OutParameter.Description: Destination reference; contains the number of stacks of the polled buff
